Detailed Description

A LightMan is a positional Light that can be placed in a 3D scenegraph.

This makes it easy to position the light using coordinates local to other scenegraph objects.

A LightMan is a leaf node, and so children cannot be added to it.

See also:
Spatial
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0
